## ContractEvents.addListener() method

Subscribe to contract events

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addListener(eventName: keyof TContract["filters"], listener: (event: Record<string, any>) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | keyof TContract\["filters"\] | the event name as defined in the contract |
|  listener | (event: Record&lt;string, any&gt;) =&gt; void | the receiver that will be called on every new event |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

Add a listener for a particular contract event

## Example


```javascript
contract.events.addListener("TokensMinted", (event) => {
  console.log(event);
});
```
